channel.title: Comments on: April 2013 – Ruby on Rails!
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: By: Neil Kidd
item.dc:creator: Neil Kidd
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/agilestaffordshire/software-craftsmanship/april-2013-ruby-on-rails/#comment-13814">ruby on rails developer uk</a>.
@ruby on rails developer uk - I'm not sure if this is a spam comment! But here goes: We use the cloud hosting from tsohost - very reasonable.
We'd appreciatte you making any order via our affilliatte link http://billing.tsohost.co.uk/aff.php?aff=1109 - it won't cost you any more but will help pay for the hosting.
Thanks, Neil
item.content:encoded:
In reply to ruby on rails developer uk.

@ruby on rails developer uk – I’m not sure if this is a spam comment! But here goes:
We use the cloud hosting from tsohost – very reasonable.

We’d appreciatte you making any order via our affilliatte link http://billing.tsohost.co.uk/aff.php?aff=1109 – it won’t cost you any more but will help pay for the hosting.

Thanks,
Neil

item.title: By: ruby on rails developer uk
item.dc:creator: ruby on rails developer uk
item.description: Hello would you mind letting me know which webhost you're using? I've loaded your blog in 3 completely different web browsers and I must say this blog loads a lot quicker then most. Can you suggest a good internet hosting provider at a fair price? Many thanks, I appreciate it!
item.content:encoded:
Hello would you mind letting me know which webhost you’re using?
I’ve loaded your blog in 3 completely different web browsers and I must say this blog loads
a lot quicker then most. Can you suggest a good internet
hosting provider at a fair price? Many thanks, I
appreciate it!

item.title: By: paulswilliams
item.dc:creator: paulswilliams
item.description:
No problems Jon,
Rails seems to attract love and criticism in equal measure - hey it's opinionated!
Paul.
item.content:encoded:
No problems Jon,

Rails seems to attract love and criticism in equal measure – hey it’s opinionated!

Paul.

item.title: By: Jon Willis
item.dc:creator: Jon Willis
item.description: Many thanks Paul for the introduction into Ruby on rails. And for the balanced view on its Pros/Cons.
item.content:encoded: Many thanks Paul for the introduction into Ruby on rails. And for the balanced view on its Pros/Cons.
